description: a(n) = M(n) + m(n) for n >= 2, where M(n) = max{ a(i) + a(n-i): i = 1..n-1 }, m(n) = min{ a(i) + a(n-i): i = 1..n-1 }.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
J. M. Dover, On two OEIS conjectures [broken link?]
formula: n + sum(k=2, n, A022907(n)).a(n+1) = 1+3*Sum_{k=1..n} A033485(k). - _Philippe DelÃ©ham_, Jun 17 2010a(n) = a(n-1) + 1 + a(floor(n/2)) + a(ceiling(n/2))) for n>1, a(1) = 1. - _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 17 2013
maple: a:= proc(n) option remember; `if`(n=1, 1,      a(n-1)+1+a(floor(n/2))+a(ceil(n/2)))    end:seq(a(n), n=1..100);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 17 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
